products.name: Classic Chef's Knife
products.description: A perfectly balanced 8-inch chef's knife, forged from high-carbon stainless steel. An essential tool for every kitchen.

products.name: Non-Stick Cast Iron Skillet
products.description: 12-inch pre-seasoned cast iron skillet. Provides even heat distribution for a perfect sear every time. Oven safe.

products.name: Acacia Wood Cutting Board
products.description: A large, durable cutting board made from beautiful and sustainable acacia wood. Gentle on knives and easy to clean.

products.name: Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls (Set of 3)
products.description: A set of three nesting mixing bowls (1.5, 3, and 5 quarts) with non-slip silicone bases. Dishwasher safe.

products.name: Glass Food Storage Containers (5-Pack)
products.description: A set of five airtight glass containers with locking lids. Perfect for meal prep, leftovers, and pantry organization.

products.name: Silicone & Wood Utensil Set
products.description: 12-piece utensil set including spatulas, spoons, and tongs. Heat-resistant silicone heads and eco-friendly wooden handles.

products.name: Dutch Oven with Lid
products.description: 5-quart enameled cast iron Dutch oven. Perfect for slow cooking, braising, and baking. Comes with a tight-fitting lid.

products.name: Bamboo Steamer Basket
products.description: 10-inch bamboo steamer basket for healthy steaming. Stackable design with two tiers. Natural and eco-friendly.

products.name: Ceramic Knife Set (3-Piece)
products.description: Set of three ceramic knives: chef's knife, utility knife, and paring knife. Ultra-sharp and lightweight.

products.name: Silicone Baking Mat
products.description: Non-stick silicone baking mat for cookies, pastries, and more. Reusable and easy to clean. Fits standard baking sheets.

products.name: Stainless Steel Measuring Cups (Set of 4)
products.description: Set of four stainless steel measuring cups: 1/4 cup, 1/3 cup, 1/2 cup, and 1 cup. Durable and stackable.

products.name: Plastic Food Containers (10-Pack)
products.description: Set of ten plastic food containers with snap-on lids. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Various sizes for different needs.
